title: Show random startup idea on web page
description: Create a web server using Bun's built-in HTTP server (https://bun.sh/docs/api/http) that displays a random startup idea on a web page.

title: Generate random startup idea with CLI
description: Create a CLI command that generates and displays a random startup idea. The CLI should output a creative startup idea to the terminal.

title: Add button to generate new idea
description: Add a button to the web page that generates and displays a new random startup idea when clicked, without requiring a full page refresh.
